text: You say something stupid and the next morning you're in the headlines.
author: Barry Manilow

text: My ideal is to wake up in the morning and run around the meadow naked.
author: Daryl Hannah

text: Mom and Dad would stay in bed on Sunday morning, but the kids would have to go to church.
author: Lynn Johnston

text: I think I'm a fun flatmate. I'm always cheerful. I go on tour with my band so it's 12 people on one bus and I feel like I'm the one who's happy in the morning. I'm not a chaotic person, but I might slack off on doing the dishes from time to time.
author: Zooey Deschanel

text: I don't want to be in my car all day. I love getting up in the morning in Venice and walking my dogs down to the cafe to get my tea, and then perhaps going to a bookstore and sitting and reading, then walking to the beach.
author: Jessica Chastain
